These cities all have a population over 500,000 people.Web-Japan.org, "Local self- government," p. 3; retrieved 2012-12-2. ==History== The designated cites or ordinance cities were created because of the Local Autonomy Law of Japan. Each city does many of the things normally done by prefectures. ===List=== Cities designated by government ordinance recognized starting in 1956.Jacobs, A.J. "Japan's Evolving Nested Municipal Hierarchy: The Race for Local Power in the 2000s," Urban Studies Research, (2011); doi:10.1155/2011/692764; retrieved 2012-12-5.
